feed.title: ToolJet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.34.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features:

  • Databricks datasource integration by @ShazanRizvi in #9174. (Issue: #9167)
  • Engagespot datasource integration by @jobin-logidots in #9012

üõ† Fixes:

  • Fix TJDB null filter in dashboard by @blank0537 in #9055. (Issue: #8067)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.33.6...v2.34.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.34.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features:

  • Workspace constants are now encrypted and stored in DB by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9250
  • UI/UX revamp on emails by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9223, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9255, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9271
  • Added workspace variable deprecation message by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9275

üõ† Fixes:

  • Improvement on dashboard load queries by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9249 and https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9153 https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9264
  • Catching uncaught error on all exception filter by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9197
  • Added routes to subpages by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9054
  • Dark mode fixes by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9251

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.34.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • hotfix : Not able to view full text while using vertical alignment in text component (https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9272)
  • hotfix: Event are not getting triggered in map component (https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9263)

Co-authored-by: Kiran Ashok stepinfwd@gmail.com

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.34.1...v2.34.2

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.35.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features:

  • Supabase plugin integration by @blank0537 in #9213 (#9138)
  • Pocketbase plugin integration by @blank0537 in #9145 (#7338)

‚≠ê Improvements:

  • Updated display name for button by @devesh-2002 in #9102 (#9090)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.34.2...v2.35.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.35.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

‚≠ê Improvements

  • Allow Google tag manager analytics in CSP by @neo-alejandro-garbi in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9346

üß™ Tests

  • Change message for when there are no action buttons by @Sadaf-A in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9274

üìù Docs

  • Add pocketbase docs by @amanregu in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9304
  • Updated the runjs guide along with the formating by @2001asjad in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9294
  • Update MacOS setup guide by @karan-rathod-316 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9317
  • Update outdated marketplace plugin docs by @karan-rathod-316 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9305
  • Update workspace constants by @amanregu in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9292
  • Update licensing documentation by @amanregu in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9215
  • Supabase plugin by @amanregu in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9287
  • Update top bar documentation by @karan-rathod-316 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9334
  • Update formatting for ToolJet Database, Workspace and Dashboard by @2001asjad in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9259
  • Update formatting for How To section by @amanregu in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9169
  • Update information on getter functions for RunJS and RunPy docs by @karan-rathod-316 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9340

New Contributors

  • @2001asjad made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9294
  • @Sadaf-A made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9274
  • @neo-alejandro-garbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9346

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.35.0...v2.35.1
